thread.title: 9 Perks Of Being On Your Own Today (Or Any Other Day)
thread.title_full: 9 Perks Of Being On Your Own Today (Or Any Other Day)

author: Brittany Wong
title: 9 Perks Of Being On Your Own Today (Or Any Other Day)
text:
9 Perks Of Being On Your Own Today (Or Any Other Day) Breaking: Being on your own is actually awesome. 02/14/2017 04:12 pm ET Brittany Wong Relationships Editor, The Huffington Post 
In our relationship-obsessed culture, being on your own tends to get a bad rap. The reality is, spending time on your own is one of the healthiest things you can do for yourself . (Plus, some new research suggests that single people are just as happy as their couple counterparts .) 
The Huffington Post original video above is a great reminder of the perks of being alone. For starters, you can get up whenever you damn please and choose to spend your day as exactly as you see fit. (No judgement if that means chocolate and ice cream for lunch.) 
Watch the clip above for more.
